lead_paragraph: Fired Baylor coach Art Briles is fighting back, nearly two months after he was let go in the fallout over how the school investigated rape allegations.

headline.print_headline: Briles Asks Court to Remove Him From Lawsuit Against Baylor
headline.main: Briles Asks Court to Remove Him From Lawsuit Against Baylor

snippet: Fired Baylor coach Art Briles is fighting back, nearly two months after he was let go in the fallout over how the school investigated rape allegations....
